text: Daniel Scavino Jr. (born 1976) is an American political adviser. He has been the deputy chief of staff in the second Trump administration since 2025. He was White House deputy chief of staff for communications from 2020 to 2021, and Director of Social Media from 2017 to 2021. Scavino was the general manager of Trump National Golf Club Westchester, and director of social media for the Donald Trump 2016 presidential campaign. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
